title: Creative Roots Rwanda | Art & Stories for All
description: Empowering youth through art, sculpture, and storytelling
mission_text: Art & Stories for All is empowering youth and out-of-school individuals to discover and express their hidden talents through art, sculpture, and storytelling.
who_we_are_text: Founded by NIYOMUKIZA Didier, Creative Roots Rwanda is a grassroots creative initiative born from the passion to unlock potential in Rwandan youth.
